Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 30th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 2012...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/6/2015, off Pat Misch (KCA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/17/2015, off Hector Ambriz (MIN)...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 4/5/2016...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Seattle on 4/29/2016...
Injured on 9/20/2016 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 2016...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Tampa Bay on 4/30/2018 (Going to CHA: P J. Samardzija, P B. Bray, LF W. Jennings, P M. Stoudt, P I. Joly. Going to TB: 2B S. Piscotty, P R. Victoria)...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 2020...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/17/2021 to a 2-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2021...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/6/2023 to a 3-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
